Namespace: user

user

Methods for interacting with the User Management endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#user
Source:
  • user.js, line 1

Methods

create(parameters)

Create a new user.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#user_create
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
email string Email address for this user.
name string Name for this user.
password string Password for this user.
api_enabled string <optional>
 'yes' 'yes' or 'no'. If yes, this user's API key will work on api.vultr.com.
acls array List of ACLs that this user should have.
Source:
  • user.js, line 7

https://www.vultr.com/api/#user_delete

parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
USERID string ID of the user to delete.

https://www.vultr.com/api/#user_update
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
USERID string ID of the user to update.
email string <optional>
 Email address for this user.
name string <optional>
 Name for this user.
password string <optional>
 Password for this user.
api_enabled string <optional>
 'yes' or 'no'. If yes, this user's API key will work on api.vultr.com.
acls array <optional>
 List of ACLs that this user should have.
